title: Jungle Crate
info: The Jungle Crate is a pre-Hardmode crate that can only be fished in the Jungle. Jungle Crates contain items found in standard crates, and on the  Desktop version and  Mobile version, they always contain an item normally found in Ivy Chests within Jungle Shrines. On the  Console version, Jungle Crates only have a chance to drop an item from an Ivy Chest, but they may also drop Hardmode bars if opened in a Hardmode world. Its Hardmode counterpart is the Bramble Crate.
